trans-unit.source: Provides methods that correspond to SQL Server functions.
trans-unit.target: 提供對應至 SQL Server 函式的方法。

trans-unit.source: Methods in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.SqlClient.SqlMethods" /> class are only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.
trans-unit.target: 只有 LINQ to SQL 查詢才支援 <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.SqlClient.SqlMethods" /> 類別中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of day boundaries between two specified dates.
trans-unit.target: 計算兩個指定之日期間的日界限數。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] `DATEDIFF` function; using `day` to specify the type of time boundary crossed.
trans-unit.target: 對應至[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]`DATEDIFF`函式; 使用`day`來指定時間界限類型跨越。

trans-unit.source: For more about this [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] function, see [DATEDIFF](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114010) in the Microsoft SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，這[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]函式，請參閱[DATEDIFF](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114010) Microsoft SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of day boundaries between two nullable dates.
trans-unit.target: 計算兩個可為 null 的日期之間的日界限數。

trans-unit.source: When both parameters are not <see langword="null" />, returns the number of day boundaries between the two specified dates.
trans-unit.target: 當兩個參數都不是 <see langword="null" /> 時，傳回兩個指定之日期間的日界限數。

trans-unit.source: When one or both parameters are <see langword="null" />, returns a <see langword="null" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 當參數的其中一個或兩個都是 <see langword="null" /> 時，傳回 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specific character string matches a specified pattern.
trans-unit.target: 判斷特定字元字串是否符合指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: This method is currently only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.
trans-unit.target: 目前只有 LINQ to SQL 查詢支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] `LIKE` functionality cannot be exposed through translation of existing common language runtime (CLR) and .NET Framework constructs, and is unsupported outside of a LINQ to SQL context.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] `LIKE`功能無法透過轉譯現有 common language runtime (CLR) 和.NET Framework 建構，並不支援 LINQ to SQL 內容之外。

trans-unit.source: The use of this method outside of LINQ to SQL will always throw an exception of type <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LINQ to SQL 之外這個方法一律會擲回例外狀況型別的<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: The string to be searched for a match.
trans-unit.target: 用來搜尋比對的字串。

trans-unit.source: The pattern, which may include wildcard characters, to match in <c>matchExpression</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>matchExpression</c> 中比對的模式，可能會包含萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specific character string matches a specified pattern.
trans-unit.target: 判斷特定字元字串是否符合指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: This method is currently only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.
trans-unit.target: 目前只有 LINQ to SQL 查詢支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="matchExpression" /> matches the pattern; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="matchExpression" /> 符合模式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] `LIKE` functionality cannot be exposed through translation of existing common language runtime (CLR) and .NET Framework constructs, and is unsupported outside of a LINQ to SQL context.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] `LIKE`功能無法透過轉譯現有 common language runtime (CLR) 和.NET Framework 建構，並不支援 LINQ to SQL 內容之外。

trans-unit.source: The use of this method outside of LINQ to SQL will always throw an exception of type <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LINQ to SQL 之外這個方法一律會擲回例外狀況型別的<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: The string to be searched for a match.
trans-unit.target: 用來搜尋比對的字串。

trans-unit.source: The pattern, which may include wildcard characters, to match in <c>matchExpression</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>matchExpression</c> 中比對的模式，可能會包含萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: The character to put in front of a wildcard character to indicate that it should be interpreted as a regular character and not as a wildcard character.
trans-unit.target: 放在萬用字元之前的字元，表示它應解譯為一般字元，而非萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specific character string matches a specified pattern.
trans-unit.target: 判斷特定字元字串是否符合指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: This method is currently only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.
trans-unit.target: 目前只有 LINQ to SQL 查詢支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="matchExpression" /> matches the pattern; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="matchExpression" /> 符合模式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
